com.koucha.experimentalgame

Interface GameObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Character, Effect, EffectProjectile, EffectRay, HUD

    public interface GameObject
    GameObjects can be added to a GameObjectList and will then be processed once per iteration of the game loop

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Is called whenever the Screen content is calculated anew The rendering of the GameObject happens in this method
      void setHandler(GameObjectList list)
      Sets the Handler of the GameObject.
      void update()
      Is called with a set frequency from the game loop

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Is called whenever the Screen content is calculated anew

        The rendering of the GameObject happens in this method

        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object to be painted on

      • setHandler

        void setHandler(GameObjectList list)
        Sets the Handler of the GameObject. Usually that's the list containing it.
        Parameters:
        list - GameObjectList containing this GameObject

      • update

        void update()
        Is called with a set frequency from the game loop
